title: Murad Environmental Shield Essential-C Renewal Complex. 2: Treat/Repair, 1.0 fl oz (30 ml)
description: Reverse damage and restores environmentally aging skin by reducing the appearance of fine lines by 17% after one application and reducing photo damage by 46% in 4 weeks. Scientifically proven Vitamin C innovation combats environmental damage and restores youthful clarity. Patented Skin Repair System rejuventates the appearance of overstressed skin. Vitamin C, Retinol, and Vitamin A work together to fade pigmentation and restore maximum clarity. Retinol Palmitate exfoliates to reveal newer, younger skin. As a leader in research and development, Murad has long been at the forefront of skincare science. Applying insights from my skin research center, dermatology practice and the Murad Medical Spa, we continue this tradition. Ours is an inclusive health philosophy, based on the water principle, a comprehensive inside and out approach to optimal skin health and total wellness. Healthy skin is beautiful skin. My commitment is to provide you with the most advanced formulations and pharmaceutical grade ingredients to restore and strengthen your skin, allowing your healthy radiance to shine through. Scientifically proven. Dermatologist developed and tested. Murad does not test on animals. Made in the USA.

title: NuFountain® Fresh Cosmetics C20+ Lightening, Skin Lightening Vitamin C Serum
description:
1 Fluid Ounce (30mL) of vitamin C lightening serum. Comes in sealed light-blocking bottle with dropper for dispensing serum. Fragrance free. Manufactured using only the freshest, highest-quality ingredients.  Used daily, protects skin with antioxidant action to repair damage from UV, environment, and signs of aging. A daily regime for at least two months results in lighter, firmer, smoother younger-looking skin. Can be used under sun block and makeup.

IMPORTANT STORAGE INFORMATION: Always store bottles in a cool, dark place. You may store serum in a refrigerator. Always store unopened bottles in the refrigerator.

SERUM CONSISTENCY:
NuFountain Fresh Cosmetics specializes in fresh-made serums using l-ascorbic acid which is water soluble. To effectively penetrate to your cellular level where it repairs free-radical damage, we do not use any oils, thickeners or unnecessary ingredients that make it thick and slow absorption. Our serums are very thin and since they are made fresh when ordered (free from oxidation which makes serums turn yellow, amber or brown and develop a strong odor), they are clear and appear water-like. This is what a great l-ascorbic acid serum should look and feel like. We produce fresh, honest l-ascorbic acid serums that are clear, and absorb immediately into your skin.

SPECIAL OFFER: Purchase 2 bottles -- get a 3rd bottle FREE -- Enter the total number of bottle you want (such as "3") and the price of 1 bottle will be deducted when you checkout -- and you can mix and match with other NuFountain serums.

ORDERING LARGER QUANTITIES: To get 6 bottles (total), enter "6" for quantity and you will get the price of 2 bottles discounted at checkout. You get 1 bottle discounted for every three ordered and there is no limit.

title: Obagi System Professional-C 20% Vitamin C Serum, 1-Ounce Bottle (30ml)
description: Professional-C serum with Vitamin C neutralizes free radicals at all layers of the skin, before they damage skin cells and accelerate aging. Provides superior antioxidant protection with deep penetration. Obagi Professional-C Serum 20% is suitable for all skin types.

title: The Original Hyaluronic Acid Serum 100% Pure Refill 8 oz
description: Pure. Natural. The Timeless Pure collection contains a high concentration of hyaluronic acid that you won't find anywhere else. All natural and paraben free, we don't use excess ingredients to make up for the lack of actives. We like to keep it simple and effective.This product contains:Hyaluronic Acid - one of the most powerful hydrating and moisturizing ingredients on the market today. Holds up to 1000 times its weight in water! And as always, we use a higher concentration of HA than any other seller. This serum contains 1% HA, or about 2x the amount of HA contained in others 60% concoctions.
